name: Birthday Surprise Assets Manifest
description: List of required assets for the birthday surprise webpage

assets.notes: Optional audio file. Should be a birthday song (e.g., Happy Birthday instrumental). Recommended format: MP3, max 5MB. If not provided, the play button will show an error.

external_libraries.name: canvas-confetti
external_libraries.load_strategy: lazy (within 30s of target or on celebration trigger)

external_libraries.name: lottie-web
external_libraries.load_strategy: lazy (within 30s of target or on celebration trigger)

audio.birthday-song.mp3: Place your birthday song MP3 file in /public/assets/ directory. Recommended: Happy Birthday instrumental, 2-3 minutes, optimized for web (128-192kbps).

optional_enhancements: Add og:image meta tags with a birthday celebration image for social sharing
Optimize audio file with tools like Audacity or ffmpeg for web delivery
